alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:56PM EDT until August 15 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Christopher Newport University, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Newport News, Hampton, Christopher Newport University, Northampton, and Beaconsdale around 500 PM EDT. Langley AFB and Tabb around 505 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dare, Newport News Golf Course, Langley View, Oyster Point, Oriana, Messick, Hornsbyville, Hilton Village, Harris Grove, and Menchville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; York
